1667430.name: Fantasy Grounds - Tome of Horrors 2020
1667430.description:
Tome of Horrors 2020

From the gargantuan, aquatic afanc, a hundred feet in length, to the eerie sphinx zombie bound by magic to guard forbidden lore, the Tome of Horrors 2020 provides you with a wealth of beasts and legends to stock the forests, dungeons, skies, and oceans of your world. Creatures of the underworld, denizens of the elemental planes of existence -- they're all to be found within the covers of this compendium!
Necromancer Games is proud to bring you this resource for the Fifth Edition of the world's most popular role-playing game!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Potter
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
